Getting started¶

Investment research is a very broad field, and there are many different ways to approach it. This project is intended to be a starting point for your own research, and to provide a framework for you to build on. It is not intended to be a complete solution, and it is not intended to be a black box that you can blindly trust.

The project is written in Python, and uses the [Pandas](http://pandas.pydata.org/) library for data analysis.

The project is structured as follows:

  • data - contains the data files used by the project

  • lib - contains the source code for the project

  • notebooks - contains Jupyter notebooks that demonstrate how to use the project

  • tests - contains unit tests for the project

The project is designed to be used with [Jupyter](http://jupyter.org/), which is a web-based interactive development environment for Python.

Installation¶

The project requires Python 3.5 or later.
